official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, with respect to the qualifications of soil and water conservation districts for reduced postage rates.

summary.text: Extends the reduced postage rates currently in effect for the publications of a qualified nonprofit organization to the informational and educational publications of any conservation district responsible for soil and water conservation.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, with respect to the qualifications of soil and water conservation districts for reduced postage rates.
